original_title: Mark Lowry: My First Comedy Video
overview: Mark Lowry in his very first comedy video.  Program: 1.  Homesick In England 2.  Tumors And Trust 3.  Feelings Or Faith 4.  Alarm Clock 5.  The Church Brat 6.  Psychiatric Help 7.  Wrestling In The Kitchen 8.  Mama Had “Enough” 9.  Miss Barth 10. Summa Cum Laude 11. Bedtime Stories 12. The Greatest Story Ever Told 13. What A Savior He Is
title: Mark Lowry: My First Comedy Video
